title: (x) Acellera techy logo - similar to Spyrogeometric {Tamas}
content:
Could anybody please tell me which font is this one?  
 [http://acellera.com/img/acellera\_logoR.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202040903/http:/acellera.com/img/acellera_logoR.jpg "http://acellera.com/img/acellera\_logoR.jpg")

many thanks
author: ibuch

comments.content:
It seems geometric enough that unless you know of other letters, I would say this is custom-drawn.

- Mike Yanega

Thanks but it was not.  
This was written in Photoshop on a Win (XP probably) computer that the client hasn't got anymore...  
I have tried on two PCs, looking once and again to all font with no success.

He recalls that the character spacing was reduced... if that is of any help to recognize it.

thanks again

Looks like [Spyrogeometric](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202040903/http:/www.dafont.com/spyrogeometric.font?nb_ppp=50&text=acellera) with a modified e and r.

--- Tamas Ferencz ---

@Atwe  
That gets really close!

Could we get even closer?

thanks
